attributes.action: Petition to remove public funding for the British Broadcasting Corporation.
attributes.additional_details: The reporting of stories regarding the crisis at Calais, the Greek financial crisis, the serious internal problems facing Sweden following the disasterous policy of mass immigration of "so called" refugees, suspiciously were removed from the television news screens during the campaign to both leave or remain in the European Union.
attributes.background: Following disgraceful biased coverage of the National EU membership referendum. I wish to submit this referendum.
